member.summary: If true, uses MaxRestarts (not recommended), otherwise uses MaxRuntime

member.summary: Maximum Optimizer Runtime per Recipe in [ms]

member.summary: Maximum number of restarts (not recommended to use), please use MaxRuntime instead!

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.OptimizeTables
member.summary: If true, optimizer is allowed to change the setup of the tables

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.MTCIdenticalTowers
member.summary: If true, MTC towers will be set up identically.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.FillWPC100Percent
member.summary: If true, components on the WPC will be set up more than once until the tower is filled up to 100%.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.TowerFillUpStrategy
member.summary: Fill up strategy

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.IdenticalNozzleSetups
member.summary: If true, for all collect and place heads the nozzle setup on the head will be identical

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.OptimizeNozzleChanger
member.summary: If true, nozzle changers will be optimized (nozzles are set up)

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.OptimizeHeadSteps
member.summary: If true, head steps are created and saved (typically true)

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.OptMsgLevel
member.summary: Optimizer Message Level

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.SupportPlacementLevels
member.summary: If false, all placements that have a level > 0 will be put on the last placement area of the line. If true, user has to fix all components with level > 0. In each placement area levels are accounted for.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.CompMaxSetupCount
member.summary: Maximum setup count per component in resulting setup

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.DontChangeCompLoc
member.summary: If true, components that are used in the job (feeders that have this component) won't be removed from Setup or moved to another location. Only valid for SIPLACE Pro versions greater and equal 4.1!

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.DontChangeCompLocModifyFeeder
member.summary: Only valid if DontChangeCompLoc is true, also! If true, Components that are not needed will be removed from Feeder pockets, so that other components can be set up onto this feeder. Also, empty pockets will be filled up with other components, if the space is needed. Only valid for SIPLACE Pro versions greater and equal 4.1!

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.ClusterSetupFillLevel
member.summary: Specifies the setup fill level in percent that should be reached when clustering (100 means that all feeder spaces are filled up)

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.AssignPlacementPosFromHeadschedule
member.summary: If true, the same head will place the same placement positions in an already optimized recipe when re-optimizing. Only valid for SIPLACE Pro versions greater and equal 5.0!

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.KeepPlacementSequence
member.summary: If true, the same head will place the same placement positions in the same order in an already optimized recipe when re-optimizing. Only valid for SIPLACE Pro versions greater and equal 5.0!

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.OptLogLevel
member.summary: Logging level

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.SaveResults
member.summary: If true, a SPOT file will be written. To specify the location, use LogFileName parameter.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.LogFileName
member.summary: Location of the SPOT file that will be written. SaveResults needs to be true.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.IgnoreFixedFlags
member.summary: Only valid if DontChangeCompLoc is true, also! If true, Components that are fixed, but not needed will be removed from the setup Only valid for SIPLACE Pro versions greater and equal 5.1!

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.NoAdditionalSetupComps
member.summary: If true, if a component is already present on setup, it will not be set up again by the optimizer. Only valid for SIPLACE Pro versions greater and equal 5.1!

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.PerformanceSettingLevel2Fast
member.summary: If true, the level 2 optimization will be faster. If a job contains lots of recipes, there is a chance of reaching the memory limit though. Only valid for SIPLACE Pro versions greater and equal 5.2!

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.WarningsAsErrors
member.summary: This is a list of warnings that should be treated as errors. Only valid for SIPLACE Pro versions greater and equal 5.2!

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.AddCppPrecedences
member.summary: Avoid nozzle collisions on MultiStar CPP heads.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.AllPlacementsAtFirstStopper
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all placements should be at the first stopper. The assignment to the first stopper is done without reachability check.
member.remarks: This property was introduced in SIPLACE Pro 13.0. If null is passed in the default value of false is used.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.PerformanceSettingCreateTimeStamp
member.summary: Update Time Stamp for optimized recipes. If true, increases performance of the first integrity check of an optimized recipe. However, the performance of this job optimization will be slightly lower in the read/write phase.
member.remarks: If null is passed in the default value of true is used.

member.name: F:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.UseJobNameForResultSetup
member.summary: If true, uses the job name to derive the newly created optimized setup name. If false, uses the initial setup name
member.remarks: This property was introduced in SIPLACE Pro 13.0. If null is passed in the default value of false is used.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.BalanceLBOStepping
member.summary: If true, balances the Long Board Option Steps for stations with 2 placement areas with each having 2 active stoppers. This means that the optimizer tries to assign equal amounts of placement positions for each stopper If false, uses the default algorithm.
member.remarks: This property was introduced in SIPLACE Pro 14.1. If null is passed in the default value of false is used.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.MaxTableFillLevel
member.summary: Maximum allowed fill level of a table (0..100%)
member.remarks: If null is passed in the default value of 100 is used.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.CompletePanelsSeparately
member.summary: If true, the station tries to complete placements of one panel in one placement area before the placement of the next panel begins
member.remarks: This property was introduced in SIPLACE Pro 17.1. If null is passed in the default value of false is used.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.AddAllPrecedences
member.summary: Avoid nozzle collisions on all heads (not only MultiStart CPP ).
member.remarks: This property was introduced in SIPLACE Pro 18.0. If null is passed in the default value of false is used.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.TryAssignPlacementPosFromHeadschedule
member.summary: Try to avoid redistribution of components which are set up multiple times. If true and if possible, the same head will place the same placement positions in an already optimized recipe when re-optimizing.
member.remarks: This property was introduced in SIPLACE Pro 18.0. If null is passed in the default value of false is used.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizationParameters.PlacementLevelBinding
member.summary: Placement level binding to the last placement area If false, placements with level higher than 0 are allowed to be placed as soon as possible If true (default), placements with level higher than 0 are bound to the last placement area of the line
member.remarks: This property was introduced in SIPLACE Pro 19.0. If null is passed in the default value of true is used.

member.summary: Returns a that represents this instance.

member.name: T:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizerMessage
member.summary: This class contains details about a specific optimizer message.

member.name: P:Asm.As.Oib.SiplacePro.Optimizer.Contracts.Data.OptimizerMessage.MessageType
member.summary:
Warning, Info, Error
Value MessageType
Info Message some informational content
Warning
Message indicates some warning in the data consistency, which is not hindering the system to prepare the machine for operation but which might not be the intention of the line engineer and might require some attention.
Error
An error indicates that some data inconsistency hinders the integrity check to finish successfully or that the optimizer can not find a valid setup configuration due to some constrains which must be fulfilled which are not.
